title: Herbal Gift Giving w/ Cantos de La Tierra
desc: A workshop on how to make handmade herbal gifts for your loved ones ? Date: Saturday, December 5th Time: 11:00am-1:30pm Location: Here & Now??5471 Huntington Drive North, Los Angeles, CA 90032 ? Early Bird Registration b4 Nov. 29th= $20 $25-30 at the door or after 11/29. Limited space so Register ASAP! ? Berenice Dimas 'La Bere' of Cantos de la Tierra will share various herbal gifts for your loved ones. Gifts may include a personalized massage oil, a tea blend, and herbal salt blend. ? Join us to make some handmade intentional healing gifts! ? Berenice will also have pomadas, lip balm, and earring for sale at the event. ? About Berenice: Berenice is the visionary of Cantos De La Tierra, a full spectrum doula, community based healer, reiki practitioner, restorative bodyworker, medicine maker, herbalist in training, and health educator. Find out more about Berenice's work by visiting her website ~ www.berenicedimas.com and her FB page Cantos De La Tierra? ? About Mujeres de Maiz: Mujeres de Maiz (women of the corn) is a women of color spiritual ARTivist collective based in East LA since 1997. Their mission is to bring together and empower diverse women and girls through the creation of community spaces that provide holistic wellness through education, art programming, exhibition and publishing. www.mujeresdemaiz.co
